Direct Loan is a peso loan app for Filipinos by IDIRECT FINANCE COMPANY, INC.

SEC company name:
iDIRECT FINANCE COMPANY INC.
SEC company registration NO.2021080023709-02
CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY NO.F-21-0010-64

Direct loan is your partner for a cash loan. We strive to provide convenient and friendly credit loan service to Filipinos. Easy loan application, get funding in pesos, and make your family life better in the Philippines.

Product Introduction:
Loan Amount: ₱ 5,000.00 – ₱ 100,000.00
Loan Term: 91 days (shortest, including renewal time) - 365 days (longest, including renewal time)
Maximum APR is 24% per year, 2% monthly
Other Fees: As a credit lending service application Direct Loan will charge different fees according to the product you choose, which costs are used for credit score assessment, account management and third parties.

For example:
If you choose a loan limit of ₱ 5,000.00 with a period of 180 days, the total interest should be paid:
₱ 5,000.00 * 2% * 6= ₱ 600.00
monthly interest shall be paid:
₱ 5,000.00 * 2% = ₱ 100.00
monthly repayment bill including principle and interest shall be paid:
₱ 5,000.00/6 + ₱ 100.00 = ₱933.34
total repayment bill including principle and interest shall be paid:
₱ 5,000.00 + ₱ 600.00 = ₱ 5,600.00

Why choose Direct Loan？
Direct Loan is a convenient peso online loan App, that offers all the basic features available in any other loan app:
Simple, Easy and Fast process；
Easy Approval and fast lending
Low Interest Rates on loans
High Loan Amount
Long-term Payment Options
Repayment by Installments

Who can borrow?
Direct loan is one of the online loan app for Filipinos. If you are over 20 years old, have a valid mobile phone number and a stable source of income, you can come to Direct Loan to loan money with 2 Valid ID. We will increase the limit and loan period based on your credit score! The more data you provide, the higher your credit score.

Our Vision：Direct loan, For A Better Word
Direct Loan APP provides instant personal loan help for your urgent cash needs.Our fast cash loan has the automation function online, only 2 Valid ID is needed, which offers you loan in as fast as 3 minutes after approval. Direct Loan provides you a quick loan approval and strive to be the best loan app.
